modulesApplication package¶

Package Overview¶

The main package for our application.

Contains all other packages.

modulesApplication.admin module¶

Used to register data models in the Django admin site. We haven’t really used this.

modulesApplication.apps module¶

class modulesApplication.apps.ModulesApplicationConfig(app_name, app_module)¶

Bases: django.apps.config.AppConfig

name = 'modulesApplication'¶
ready()¶

Override of Django’s ready() method to prompt for LDAP credentials on server startup.

modulesApplication.models module¶

This module simply imports data model classes from the database package, for ease of organisation.

models location: modulesApplication/database/

modulesApplication.urls module¶

Contains the various URL patterns for our application.
